item.title: Impact Signal #1: The UN's New AI Panel, India's AI Summit, and Why Aid Is Collapsing
item.description: The UN voted 117-2 to create its first AI Scientific Panel. India hosts the biggest Global South AI summit. The IRC warns of humanitarian funding collapse. Plus: Vanuatu earthquake update, Africa's expanding early warning systems, and AI reading brain MRIs at 97.5% accuracy.
item.itunes:summary: The UN voted 117-2 to create its first AI Scientific Panel. India hosts the biggest Global South AI summit. The IRC warns of humanitarian funding collapse. Plus: Vanuatu earthquake update, Africa's expanding early warning systems, and AI reading brain MRIs at 97.5% accuracy.
